fact: Did you know that gummy bears were originally called 'dancing bears' (Tanzbären) and were inspired by trained bears that performed at European festivals?
didYouKnow: Some Haribo candies are unique to certain countries. Turkey has denture-shaped teeth gummies. The U.K.’s got milkshake candies in strawberry, banana and vanilla cream flavors. In France and Germany, blue-hued gummies pay homage to the cartoon Smurfs.

references.title: The Colorful History of Haribo Goldbears, the World’s First Gummy Bears
